segments.text: I can’t believe that woman is just standing there, completely oblivious to the mess in the kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is pouring all over the cabinets, and it’s bound to cause some serious damage.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s like she’s in her own world, polishing that plate while chaos unfolds behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I watch the boy teetering on that stool, and I feel a rush of panic; he could fall at any moment.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His focus on the cookie jar is almost admirable, but it’s so reckless!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is raising her hand, waiting for her turn to get a cookie, completely innocent of the danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s the kind of moment that could go wrong so quickly, and it frustrates me that no one sees it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish I could just shout a warning to them, but I know that would ruin their fun.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The contrast between the calm outside and the turmoil inside is striking.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think about how just one wrong move could change everything in an instant.
segments.speaker: PAR
